channel.title: Steam Version Subtitles
channel.description:
Hello @ll!
First of all, BMS is the greatest mod I've ever played. For that reason, I decided to buy the steam version. But I have a little problem. How can I change the subtitle language from english to german? It is not possible anymore to chose the subtitle language by changing the language of Half-Life 2.
So, how can I fix the problem?

item.title: Steam Version Subtitles
item.dc:creator: Adam-Bomb
item.description:
We’re working on getting different languages in for the subtitles. Thanks for the support!

Read full topic
